name: Run Run Robot!
description:
Run Run Robot is a classic endless runner! Guide the Robot to safety as he jumps, dashes, and rolls through 24 challenging levels! Collect the three precious gems on each level while avoiding all manner of hazards such as lava, spikes, and bottomless pits! Dash and bash the ground enemies who get in the Robot’s way, and bounce on flying enemies to reach higher platforms! Grab the power-ups to temporarily boost the Robot’s abilities, and collect as many coins as you can muster for extra kudos!

GAMEPLAY
Run Run Robot is deceptively easy to play! Tap the right side of the screen to jump, and tap the left side of the screen to dash. Time your jumps carefully to navigate the precariously-placed platforms, and use the dash to smash through bashable crates, rocks, and enemies. Collect all three gems for a 3-star rating, and grab the hearts and power-ups along the way to boost your Robot’s abilities!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.

FEATURES
* A fantastically fast and furious endless runner!
* Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
* Four power-ups to enhance your abilities!
* 24 challenging levels to unlock and master!
* Colorful cartoon characters and environments!
* Daytime and nighttime levels!
* Bright and bubbly background tunes!
* Suitable for players of all ages!
